RuleSet.Name: src/SchemaSaxLoader/SchemaSaxLoaderTable.java
RuleSet.Descr: Java 25 XML SAX Element Handler for Table

GenFile.Name: fileSchemaSaxLoaderTableJava
GenFile.ModuleName: $reference ManufacturingSchema lower JavaPackage$.$reference ManufacturingSchema lower SchemaName$saxloader
GenFile.BasePackageName: $reference ManufacturingSchema lower JavaPackage$.$reference ManufacturingSchema lower SchemaName$saxloader/src/main/java
GenFile.SubPackageName: $reference ManufacturingSchema lower JavaPackage$.$reference ManufacturingSchema lower SchemaName$saxloader

RuleSet.GenRule: $switch TableName Cluster implTableStartClusterElement Tenant implTableStartTenantElement default implTableStartOtherElement$
// Primary Key Attributes for Constant Enum support$switch HasSuperClassRelation yes implTableDeclPKeyInhAttrs default implTableDeclPKeyBaseAttrs$
public void endElement( String uri, String localName, String qName ) throws SAXException {$switch InheritsAnyLateResolvers yes implTableEndElementBody default MaybeHasJavaSaxLoaderEndElement$ }
$reference SuperClassRelation reference ToTable implTableResolveLateReferences$$iterate Relation( each implTableMaybeResolveLateResolver empty empty )$

$switch RelationTypeTag Lookup implTableDeclSingletonRef Container implTableDeclSingletonRef Master implTableDeclSingletonRef Owner implTableDeclSingletonRef Parent implTableDeclSingletonRef default empty$

$implJavaAtomType$ nat$Name$;$switch BaseModelAtomClass BlobDef implTableConvertColBlobValue BoolDef implTableConvertColBoolValue EnumDef implTableConvertColEnumValue Int16Def implTableConvertColInt16Value Int32Def implTableConvertColInt32Value Int64Def implTableConvertColInt64Value UInt16Def implTableConvertColUInt16Value UInt32Def implTableConvertColUInt32Value UInt64Def implTableConvertColUInt64Value Id16Gen implTableConvertColInt16Value Id32Gen implTableConvertColInt32Value Id64Gen implTableConvertColInt64Value FloatDef implTableConvertColFloatValue DoubleDef implTableConvertColDoubleValue NumberDef implTableConvertColNumberValue StringDef implTableConvertColStringValue TokenDef implTableConvertColTokenValue NmTokenDef implTableConvertColNmTokenValue NmTokensDef implTableConvertColNmTokensValue TextDef implTableConvertColTextValue DateDef implTableConvertColDateValue TimeDef implTableConvertColTimeValue TimestampDef implTableConvertColTimestampValue TZDateDef implTableConvertColTZDateValue TZTimeDef implTableConvertColTZTimeValue TZTimestampDef implTableConvertColTZTimestampValue UuidGen implTableConvertColUuidValue UuidDef implTableConvertColUuidValue DbKeyHash128Gen implTableConvertColDbKeyHash128Value DbKeyHash160Gen implTableConvertColDbKeyHash160Value DbKeyHash224Gen implTableConvertColDbKeyHash224Value DbKeyHash256Gen implTableConvertColDbKeyHash256Value DbKeyHash384Gen implTableConvertColDbKeyHash384Value DbKeyHash512Gen implTableConvertColDbKeyHash512Value DbKeyHash128Def implTableConvertColDbKeyHash128Value DbKeyHash160Def implTableConvertColDbKeyHash160Value DbKeyHash224Def implTableConvertColDbKeyHash224Value DbKeyHash256Def implTableConvertColDbKeyHash256Value DbKeyHash384Def implTableConvertColDbKeyHash384Value DbKeyHash512Def implTableConvertColDbKeyHash512Value Uuid6Gen implTableConvertColUuid6Value Uuid6Def implTableConvertColUuid6Value default ErrorUnrecognizedBaseModelAtomClass$ editBuff.getPKey().set$OptionalOrRequired$$Name$( nat$Name$ ); editBuff.get$poptop Table TableName$Buff().set$OptionalOrRequired$$Name$( nat$Name$ );
throw new RuntimeException( S_ProcName + "ERROR: Cannot use a BLOB as a PKey attribute!" );
nat$Name$ = I$reference DataType EffSchemaName$Schema.parse$reference DataType Name$( attr$Name$ );
nat$Name$ = I$reference DataType EffSchemaName$Schema.parse$reference DataType Name$( attr$Name$ );
